channel.title: Alessio Falai
channel.description: "I love keyboards :keyboard:, open-source software :penguin: and learning something new everyday :open_book:."

item.title: Audio samples for my master's thesis
item.description: Demo page containing audio samples for all the models evaluated in my master's thesis.

item.title: Tackling the Flatland challenge
item.description: An overview of my team's solutions and approaches to the 2020 NeurIPS Flatland challenge, by AIcrowd.

item.title: Jekyll + Github Pages + Travis CI
item.description: A tutorial on how to build a static site using Jekyll and on how to automatically deploy it to Github Pages using Travis CI.

item.title: Java interfaces vs. Scala traits
item.description: The highlighting of some key differences between Java interfaces and the fancy Scala traits.
